content: उपोह् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (उप-उह्) {@--1@} To propel, push or impel towards; उपोह्य रुचिरां नावं <ls>Rām.</ls>; so धनुः. {@--2@} To push under, insert, कूर्चावधस्तादुपोह्य <ls>Kātyāyana</ls>. {@--3@} To bring near, produce: connected with उपवह् in this sense; <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--4@} To accumulate, collect. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be brought about. {@--2@} To advance, begin.
